title: Advent Week 3 with Lisa Harper
description:
Christmas is almost here! Raechel and Amanda welcome author, speaker, and mom, Lisa Harper to discuss week 3 of the Advent 2021 reading plan. The three talk about the challenge of maintaining slow and unhurried Advent rhythms in the midst of an oftentimes bustling Christmas season. Join them as they contemplate and celebrate Jesus, the Light of the World, and what it means for His followers to live as people of the light. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth Advent 2021: The Everlasting Light reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Advent 2021: The Everlasting Light collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/advent-week-3-with-lisa-harper
